title: Multimodal Learning Design for Contour Map Interpretation

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic geography concepts and mathematical graph interpretation
context.additional_context: Structuring asynchronous learning environments to minimize spatiotemporal constraints, strengthening practical application skills through project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain topographical features (elevation, slope, etc.) based on visual elements of contour maps with over 85% accuracy
Learners can solve contour interval-distance-to-elevation ratio calculation problems using audio/text multimodal materials with 90% accuracy
Learners can replicate contour patterns in complex terrains using 3D modeling tools (digital mapping software) with 80% accuracy
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
